allow: Bash(do osascript -e 'tell application """"System Events"""" to tell process """"AudioBash"""" to keystroke """"t"""" using command down' sleep 0.3 done sleep 1 pgrep -lf zsh)
Bash(do osascript -e "tell application ""System Events"" to tell process ""AudioBash"" to set size of window 1 to {$size}" done pgrep AudioBash)

hooks.command: echo '=== AudioBash Development Context ===' && echo '' && echo 'Platform:' && uname -srm && echo '' && echo 'Node.js:' && node --version && echo '' && echo 'Last Build:' && (ls -lt /home/user/audiobash/dist 2>/dev/null | head -n 2 | tail -n 1 | awk '{print $6, $7, $8, $9}' || echo 'No builds found in dist/') && echo '' && echo 'Quick Test Status:' && (cd /home/user/audiobash && npm test --silent 2>&1 | grep -E '(Test Files|Tests|passed|failed)' | head -n 3 || echo 'Run npm test to check') && echo '' && echo '================================='
